name: Looney Tunes Galactic Sports
description:
Whats up, Doc?
Its time to fly to Mars for the Looney Tunes Galactic Sports.
Bugs Bunny, Daffy Duck, Wile E. Coyote, Tasmanian Devil, Porky Pig and Yosemite Sam are all competing in fast-paced, action-packed events - and they need your help to show the Martians what us earthlings are made of.
